dict.acceptation: 情感，感情；情绪；感动，激动；

sent.orig: An emotion can only be conquered by another emotion -- a stronger, superior emotion.
sent.trans: 情感只能由另一个更强更高的情感来征服。

sent.orig: The emotion is divided into two kinds, advanced emotion and low-grade emotion.
sent.trans: 感情分为两类，高级情感和低级情感。

sent.orig: The developing of the emotion is mutual; the cost of the emotion is peer to peer.
sent.trans: 感情的培养是相互的，感情的付出是对等的。

sent.orig: Leisure sports activities not only increase peoples positive emotion, but also restrict negative emotion.
sent.trans: 休闲体育活动可以增加积极情感，抑制消极情感的出现，从而维持主观幸福感，获得幸福的体验。

sent.orig: Emotion influences cognitive and the motivation of behavior. are imbued with emotion.
sent.trans: 情绪影响认知，也影响行为的动机。
